summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Admin Store and Investment Management features. All 30 backend API tests passed (100%). All frontend UI tests passed including admin login, Store Management (categories/items CRUD), Investment Management (plants/stocks CRUD), and Simulate Market Day functionality. Gradient banners render correctly on admin dashboard.
passed_tests: ✅ Admin login with credentials admin@learnersplanet.com / finlit@2026
✅ Admin Dashboard shows Store Management and Investment Management navigation cards with gradient backgrounds
✅ Store Management page loads with Categories/Items tabs
✅ Store Management: Add Category functionality with form fields (name, description, icon, color, image upload, active checkbox)
✅ Store Management: Category CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete)
✅ Store Management: Item CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete)
✅ Investment Management page loads with Plants/Stocks tabs
✅ Investment Management: Add Plant functionality with form fields (name, description, image, price, lot size, growth rates, maturity days)
✅ Investment Management: Plant CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete)
✅ Investment Management: Add Stock functionality with form fields (company name, ticker, description, logo, base price, lot size, volatility)
✅ Investment Management: Stock CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete)
✅ Investment Management: Stock price history tracking
✅ Simulate Market Day button works - stock prices fluctuate based on volatility
✅ Gradient banners render correctly (not as white boxes) on admin dashboard
seed_data_creation: Test data created during UI testing (Test Vegetable Market category, Test Sunflower Seeds plant, Test TechCo Inc. stock) was cleaned up after testing.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Admin Store and Investment Management features fully tested and working. Backend APIs at /api/admin/store/* and /api/admin/investments/* are functional. Frontend pages at /admin/store and /admin/investments are working correctly. Simulate Market Day feature updates stock prices based on volatility. All gradient banners render correctly.
